alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 26 at 2:38PM EDT until April 26 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Chesterfield County in central South Carolina... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 238 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pageland, or 20 miles east of Lancaster, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Pageland, Chesterfield, Jefferson, Ruby, Mount Croghan, Chesterfield Ruby Middle School, High Point Fire Station, Chesterfield Detention Center and Central High School. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
